    • Uses of LineElement in org.openscience.cdk.renderer.elements

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WedgeLineElement
      A 'wedge' is a triangle aligned along a bond that indicates stereochemistry.

      Constructor and Description
      WedgeLineElement(LineElement element, boolean dashed, WedgeLineElement.Direction direction, Color color)
